subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The game, like the first two in the series, turned on the finest of margins, with a fly ball that Carlos Beltran lost in the sun paving the way for Toronto’s three-run third inning.
snippet: The game, like the first two in the series, turned on the finest of margins, with a fly ball that Carlos Beltran lost in the sun paving the way for Toronto’s three-run third inning.
